displaytitle: Female Nude Seated in Chair, in Profile to Right
medium: Graphite and black crayon on cream wove paper, with perforations of sketchbook page at left edge
creditline: Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895
inscribed:
Inscribed recto, lower left, in graphite (erased): Modigliani;
upper right, in graphite: 10; inscribed verso, lower left, in
graphite (in Platt hand), with small red pencil check mark
above: r-1 (erased) Modigliani / Boersky (?)
